newsitem.title: FINLAND: LANSIVOIMA SEES SUBSTANTIAL 1996 EPS RISE.
newsitem.headline: LANSIVOIMA SEES SUBSTANTIAL 1996 EPS RISE.

text.p: Finnish electricity grid operator Lansivoima Oy said on Monday it expected full-year 1996 earnings per share to rise substantially compared to 1995.

"Net sales for the financial year are expected to exceed one billion markka and earnings per share are, according to the current outlook, expected to rise substantially on last year," Lansivoima said in a statement with its January-August interim report.
In 1995, Lansivoima's net sales were 922.6 million markka and earnings per share 12.19 markka.
